item.title: Why Most To-Do Lists Fail (And How Strategic Planning Fixes It)
item.description: Most to-do lists fail because they lack strategy. Learn why this common productivity habit breaks down and how strategic planning — with tools like Stratify — can make your tasks actually get done.
